text: Mazurka der Liebe is an East German film. It was released in 1957. It is an adaptation of the 1882 operetta Der Bettelstudent. ==External links== * Category:1957 films Category:1957 musical films Category:German musical films Category:East German films Category:German-language films Category:Films set in Poland Category:Films set in the 1700s Category:German film remakes Category:Operetta films Category:Films based on operettas
title: Mazurka der Liebe
